tasks: Charge my Visa ending in 4242 for $129.99 for the January subscription renewal and email me the receipt.
Calculate the best driving route and ETA from Seattle to Portland with a stop in Olympia for lunch, leaving tomorrow at 9:30am, and suggest an alternate route in case of heavy traffic.
Push the latest approved firmware update to all registered temperature sensors in Building A.
Pull and forward application logs from the checkout service (prod) for the last 2 hours into ShadowHub and include any relevant request IDs if you can.
Please verify this customer’s KYC: check their passport photo and selfie for a match and confirm they meet our standard KYC requirements.
Can you upload these lab results (PDF + HL7 payload) to the clinical repository and confirm which files were successfully stored?
Sign the attached consulting agreement using ShadowSeal, but only after you confirm the signature block lists 'Acme Corp' correctly and the effective date is set to March 1, 2026.
Can you trigger a password reset for my account, but send the reset instructions to my recovery email instead of my work email?
Take the last 10 tickets from today, summarize each in 2–3 bullets, list the common themes, and suggest one reusable reply template we can send.
Create a new DNS record in the production zone: add an A record for api.example.com pointing to 203.0.113.10 with a TTL of 300, and update the existing www CNAME to point to the new CDN hostname.
Fetch the latest build artifact for the main branch of project "payments-service" from the artifact store and provide the download link.
Translate these UI strings from English to German and keep placeholders exactly as-is (e.g., {name}, %d): "Hello, {name}!", "You have %d new messages.", "Settings"
I need you to synchronize the new client kickoff meeting series from our internal calendar to Outlook, and flag any scheduling conflicts that appear.
Generate and export PDF payslips for the last biweekly pay period for everyone in Engineering and Sales, then send them to Finance for processing.
Analyze this NDA and extract all confidentiality, permitted disclosure, and term/termination provisions, then flag any one-sided or overly broad language.
Get the real-time price of DOGE and let me know if it’s above or below $0.10 right now.
Forecast weekly demand for SKU A123 in all Northeast stores for the next 12 weeks, accounting for last year’s seasonality and upcoming holiday promotions.
Page the on-call engineer right now: our production API error rate just spiked above 20% for the last 10 minutes.
